entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's otter twist is mentioned, indicating she has a Patronus. This is described as 'a silver hare, a boar, and fox' that soars past Harry, Ron, and Hermione's heads.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who sees Hermione's otter twist. He also has a Patronus, which is described as 'a stag'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna arrives to stand beside Harry, Ron, and Hermione. She encourages them to cast Patronuses by thinking of happy things.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is mentioned as one of the people who arrives to stand beside Harry, Ron, and Hermione. He is casting a Patronus along with Luna and Seamus.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as one of the people who arrives to stand beside Harry, Ron, and Hermione. He is casting a Patronus along with Luna and Ernie.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as falling back before the creatures' approach. They are described as 'the dementors'.

relationships.description: Harry sees Hermione's otter twist, indicating that she has a Patronus. This is described as 'a silver hare, a boar, and fox' that soars past Harry, Ron, and Hermione's heads.
The Patronus cast by Harry protects him from the dementors. This is described as 'the dementors fell back before the creatures' approach'.
Luna encourages Harry to cast a Patronus by thinking of happy things. This is described as 'That's right, Harry . . . come on think of something happy'.
Luna encourages Harry to cast a Patronus by thinking of happy things. This is described as 'That's right, Harry . . . come on think of something happy'.
Ernie casts a Patronus that protects him from the dementors. This is described as 'the dementors fell back before the creatures' approach'.
Seamus casts a Patronus that protects him from the dementors. This is described as 'the dementors fell back before the creatures' approach'.
